Stolen car with baby inside: Mother gets bill from police to get vehicle back https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/stolen-car-with-baby-inside-in-waitara-mother-gets-bill-from-police-to-get-vehicle-back/GEZG3QRRXNENJL2MI27KA3O5TU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/stolen-car-with-baby-inside-in-waitara-mother-gets-bill-from-police-to-get-vehicle-back/GEZG3QRRXNENJL2MI27KA3O5TU/ Raphael FranksHer car was stolen from Waitara, Taranaki, on Friday. Her baby was dumped on roadside. Wed, 15 May 2024 17:23:08 +0000 A woman parked her car and went inside a dairy on the corner of Queen and Cameron streets in Waitara, Taranaki, and it was taken last Friday.
Auckland nurse who drowned her 15-week-old baby daughter wants to practise again https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-nurse-who-drowned-her-15-week-old-baby-daughter-wants-to-practise-again/4QEEBVXHD5DHLIZLRMVENUDDO4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-nurse-who-drowned-her-15-week-old-baby-daughter-wants-to-practise-again/4QEEBVXHD5DHLIZLRMVENUDDO4/ Katie Harris“She’s already lost her child, is that not enough of a conviction," her lawyer asked. Wed, 15 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Hospital corridor and doctor as a blurred defocused background
Suspended Green MP Darleen Tana has missed half of Parliament sittings in 2024, on full pay https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/suspended-green-mp-has-now-missed-half-of-this-years-sitting-of-parliament-on-full-pay/SVCTAKDPFRFHDGG3ZDLZLR5V7U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/suspended-green-mp-has-now-missed-half-of-this-years-sitting-of-parliament-on-full-pay/SVCTAKDPFRFHDGG3ZDLZLR5V7U/ Thomas CoughlanThe Greens are waiting for a report. Wed, 15 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Darleen Tana Hoff-Nielsen is the Green Party candidate for the Northland electorate in September's general election.
UK man on working holiday ordered out of NZ after serving home detention sentence for rape https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/uk-man-on-working-holiday-ordered-out-of-nz-after-serving-home-detention-sentence-for-rape/2JZLSW4IAVDHJJKZJOBZLJ4RGQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/uk-man-on-working-holiday-ordered-out-of-nz-after-serving-home-detention-sentence-for-rape/2JZLSW4IAVDHJJKZJOBZLJ4RGQ/ Tracy NealOnce he's finished his sentence, he has three months to pack up and leave. Wed, 15 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 The 27-year-old from the UK is currently serving a 12-month sentence which ends in August and has been given until November to get his affairs in order before he has to leave.
